ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Kitasi, You and I think alike:-) I have yet to kill a froglok so my faction with them should be indifferent. This should allow me to safely go whereever the
ygData.messageBody:
Kitasi,

You and I think alike:-)

I have yet to kill a froglok so my faction with them should be indifferent.
This should allow me to safely go whereever the spawn is for the Guise and
pay someone to let me loot it. Anyone have a idea of how much I should
offer for the looting rights?

Galtin of E'ci


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [SMTP:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 10:50 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> On the subject of twinking, or at least related to it. I would very much
> like to obtain a Guise of the Deceiver. Wait, don't flame me yet I know
> its
> No Drop. I would be willing to accompany a party to Lower Guk if they are
> going there anyhow and pay for the right to loot one off the assassin.
> From
> what I understand there are groups hunting him for his rare drop, whatever
> that is, that already have one for everyone in their party. I haven't
> been
> able to find anyone like this on E'ci but my higher level contacts are
> limited. If anyone is going there and would be interested in minorly
> twinking my poor little bard please let me know.
>
> There are several quests I'd like to explore and this is the only way I'll
> get the chance short of retiring my bard for about 6 months to build up an
> evil character.
>
> thank you for your time in this blatant request for aid and assistance.
>
> Kitasi
> Lookin' to darken his horizons
>
>
